mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCM_FH_ShipmentsDatailMaster (id,approvalId,approvalState,ownerId, businessDivision,businessDivisionId,province, provinceId,commerceName,commerceId, shipmentsCode,successDate,createPersion, createDate,isToSap,isToWms, isAffirmWms,canInvoice) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessDivisionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commerceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commerceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipmentsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{successDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),#{isToSap,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isToWms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAffirmWms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{canInvoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.approvalId,a.approvalState,a.ownerId,a.businessDivision,a.businessDivisionId,a.province,a.provinceId,a.commerceName,b.id AS commerceId, a.shipmentsCode,a.successDate,a.createPersion,a.createDate,a.canInvoice FROM SCM_FH_ShipmentsDatailMaster a LEFT JOIN scm_zsj_commercefirst b ON a.commerceId = b.id WHERE a.id=#{id}

select * from v_shipmentdetailmaster where id in
#{item}

select * from v_shipmentdetailmaster where shipmentsCode in
#{item}
SELECT b.* FROM SCM_FH_ShipmentsDatailMaster a ,`scm_fh_shipmentsdatail` b WHERE a.id= b.masterId AND a.ownerId = #{arg1} AND a.commerceId =#{arg0}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCM_FH_ShipmentsDatailMaster SET approvalId=#{approvalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approvalState=#{approvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownerId=#{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessDivision=#{businessDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessDivisionId=#{businessDivisionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province=#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceId=#{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerceName=#{commerceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerceId=#{commerceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipmentsCode=#{shipmentsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, successDate=#{successDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createPersion=#{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate=#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isAffirmWms = #{isAffirmWms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isToSap = #{isToSap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isToWms = #{isToWms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, canInvoice = #{canInvoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id=#{id}
